content: trim attach 2 strands of yarn with slip_stitch to any double_crochet along top edge of basket single_crochet evenly around top of basket join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet if using craft wire for stability you will hold wire along the tops of dcs and crochet over the wire fasten yarn base panel make 2 with 2 strands of yarn and n hook chain 18 row 1 double_crochet in fourth chain from hook and in each chain across chain 3 turn 16 sts row 2 - 13 double_crochet in each double_crochet across chain 3 turn at end of row 13 fasten yarn cut a piece of plastic canvas that is approximately one-half inch shorter and one-half inch narrower than base panels place canvas between base panels working through both panel pieces join yarn with slip_stitch single_crochet in same space single_crochet evenly around panels working 2 single_crochet in each corner join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet do not fasten yarn attach base to basket body align the assembled end and side panels on top of the base panel working through single_crochet round of base and the lower edges of end and side panels single_crochet evenly around working 2 single_crochet in each corner fasten yarn weave in ends weave ribbon through chain-1 sps in basket and tie in a bow at one end © 2007 beverly button http //www buttonspecialties com please do not reproduce sell or distribute this pattern by any means you may sell your finished work made from this pattern
